ARABIC: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We raised up another generation after them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: After them We raised a new generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then, after them, We brought forth another generation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We brought another generation into existence after the people of Noah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after them, We created another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, after them, We created another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We raised up after them another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thereafter, after them, We produced another generation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, after them, We brought forth another generation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We raised another generation after them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then, after them We brought forth anot her generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then after them We brought forth another generation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We raised after them another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, after them, We created another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then We produced after them another generation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, after them, We established another generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:31] Then, after them, We brought forth another generation, [another] people, namely, and these were [the people of] ‘Ād.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then, after them) after the destruction of Noah's people, (We brought forth another generation) different people;
